Detailed Description

Request for proximity Search.

This request is used to get all the companies that are located close to a given location. The given area might be given by specifying the circle (coordinates and radius) or by given a set of street segment items. The states for this request are:

NOTHING_SENT
The initial state, nothing has been done.
GET_ALL_IDS
To send packet to map module to get the IDs that are coverd with the area specified by the area described by a position (coordinate or mapID.itemID.offset) and a distance.
AWAITING_ALL_IDS
Wait for CoverdIDsReplyPacket.
GET_ALL_ITEMS_COVERED
The specified area coverd several maps, we have to send one packet to the map module for each map.
AWAITING_ALL_ITEMS_COVERED
Wait for the CoverdIDsReplyPackets, when more than one CoverdIDsRequestPacket was send.
GET_ALL_FITTING_ITEMS
To get all the item that are located in the spceified area and matches the given search parameters.
GET_ALL_FITTING_FROM_SET
This state is entered if the indata conststed of a list of item IDs. Here they are take care of.
AWAITING_ALL_FITTING_ITEMS
Wait for to get the item to return.
DONE
This request is finished and will be returned to the caller.

{requestProximity.gif}
